item.title: BROWN FORMAN CORP 10-K
item.description: BROWN FORMAN CORP, which is in the Beverages [2080] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 17, 2022 had 28337 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: net - 265 instances 2022 - 248 instances financial - 229 instances 2021 - 178 instances sales - 174 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
